title: 362. Andy & DJ CTI: Sam Harris' Absurd Comments About Trump, Opening Statement By Progressive Democrat & Berkeley Bans White People
itunes:title: 362. Andy & DJ CTI: Sam Harris' Absurd Comments About Trump, Opening Statement By Progressive Democrat & Berkeley Bans White People
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Sam Harris' statement that he'd ignore Hunter Biden having 'corpses of children in his basement' if it kept Trump from being the President, the opening statement made by Progressive Democrat Public Defender at J-6 trial, and Berkeley's co-op banning white people from common areas to avoid violence.
